description: When calling TerminateInstances on the EC2 API i get the following XML response: req-ca5e1be4-545d-42be-9bf2-93d1627aeb79 i-00000019 0pending 0pending According to the API specification the answer should look like this: 59dbff89-35bd-4eac-99ed-be587EXAMPLE i-3ea74257 32 shutting-down 16 running http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/ApiReference-query-TerminateInstances.html This causes the EC2 api for .net to throw an exception about not being able to parse the XML even though the instance was successfully terminated.
title: Answer given by TerminateInstances is not compatible with EC2 api
